title: Review FSA K-Force Wireless Electronic Disc brake road bike drivetrain
content:
A relative newcomer to the groupset market, FSAs Wireless Electronic (WE) group is quietly gaining followers and victories worldwide. While FSA’s WE first launched in 2016 with a rim brake version, more recently, the company has found success with the disc groupset — taking their first grand tour stage win in 2019 under Ángel Madrazo (Burgos-BH) […]

The post Review FSA K-Force Wireless Electronic Disc brake road bike drivetrain appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jordan Villella
